Subject: Epstein OCME 
The team has just learned from the City Medical Examiner that OCME has officially concluded Epstein's cause of death 
was hanging and the manner of death was suicide. 
OCME plans to issue a press release and the official death certificate indicating as much later this afternoon. 
EFTA00031006
